mapper.select: SELECT rptTp, DATE_FORMAT(cpcgDtime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dateValue, rptTit AS contValue FROM ScrtCtrlRptTbl WHERE 1 = 1 AND cpcgDtime BETWEEN #{startDtime} AND #{endDtime} AND cpcgYn = 'y' AND cscoCd = #{cscoCd} ORDER BY cpcgDtime ASC

SELECT SCT, CNT FROM ( SELECT dryTp AS SCT, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM WkDryTbl WHERE procDtime BETWEEN #{startDtime} AND #{endDtime} AND procSt = '2' AND dryTp in ('6','7','8') AND cscoCd = #{cscoCd} GROUP BY dryTp
UNION ALL
SELECT reqSct AS SCT, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM CscoFwReqTbl A LEFT JOIN FwSetTbl B ON A.tcktCd = B.tcktCd WHERE A.cpcgDtime BETWEEN #{startDtime} AND #{endDtime} AND A.cpcgYn = 'y' AND A.disposer IS NOT NULL AND A.procDtime IS NOT NULL AND A.cscoCd = #{cscoCd} ) T

SELECT reqSct, DATE_FORMAT(cpcgDtime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dateValue, reqTit AS contValue FROM CscoReqTbl WHERE 1 = 1 AND cpcgDtime BETWEEN #{startDtime} AND #{endDtime} AND cpcgYn = 'y' AND cscoCd = #{cscoCd} ORDER BY cpcgDtime ASC

SELECT A.esmAssetNm ,B.rqrNm ,DATE_FORMAT(A.occurDtime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dateValue ,A.esmRuleGroupPrntNm ,A.esmRuleGroupNm ,A.srcIp ,A.srcGeo ,A.destIp ,A.attackIpBlock ,A.occurCnt FROM ViolAlrtRptTbl A LEFT JOIN CscoEqpmTbl B ON A.cscoCd = B.cscoCd AND A.dtctEqpm = B.eqpmCd WHERE A.cpcgDtime BETWEEN #{startDtime} AND #{endDtime} AND A.esmRuleGroupPrntCd IS NOT NULL AND A.esmRuleGroupCd IS NOT NULL AND A.cpcgYn = 'y' AND A.mailSndYn = 'y' AND A.cscoCd = #{cscoCd} ORDER BY A.cpcgDtime

SELECT srcIp, destPort, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ViolAlrtRptTbl WHERE cpcgDtime BETWEEN #{startDtime} AND #{endDtime} AND esmRuleGroupPrntCd IS NOT NULL AND esmRuleGroupCd IS NOT NULL AND cpcgYn = 'y' AND mailSndYn = 'y' AND cscoCd = #{cscoCd} AND destIp = #{destIp} AND esmRuleGroupPrntCd = #{prntCd} GROUP BY srcIp, destPort ORDER BY CNT DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT domainUrl FROM CodeProDomainTbl WHERE cscoCd = #{cscoCd} ORDER BY domainUrl

SELECT A.esmAssetCd ,A.esmAssetNm ,B.rqrNm ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ViolAlrtRptTbl A LEFT JOIN CscoEqpmTbl B ON A.cscoCd = B.cscoCd AND A.dtctEqpm = B.eqpmCd WHERE A.cpcgDtime BETWEEN #{startDtime} AND #{endDtime} AND A.esmRuleGroupPrntCd IS NOT NULL AND A.esmRuleGroupCd IS NOT NULL AND A.cpcgYn = 'y' AND A.mailSndYn = 'y' AND A.cscoCd = #{cscoCd} AND A.gearType = #{gearType} GROUP BY A.esmAssetCd

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.occurDtime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dateValue ,A.etcFields ,A.esmAssetNm ,B.rqrNm ,A.esmMessage ,A.srcIp ,A.destIp FROM ViolAlrtRptTbl A LEFT JOIN CscoEqpmTbl B ON A.cscoCd = B.cscoCd AND A.dtctEqpm = B.eqpmCd WHERE A.cpcgDtime BETWEEN #{startDtime} AND #{endDtime} AND A.esmRuleGroupPrntCd IS NOT NULL AND A.esmRuleGroupCd IS NOT NULL AND A.cpcgYn = 'y' AND A.mailSndYn = 'y' AND A.cscoCd = #{cscoCd} AND A.gearType = #{gearType} ORDER BY A.occurDtime

SELECT
esmRuleGroupPrntCd, esmRuleGroupPrntNm, COUNT(*) AS CNT
srcIp, COUNT(*) AS CNT
destPort, COUNT(*) AS CNT
FROM ViolAlrtRptTbl WHERE cpcgDtime BETWEEN #{startDtime} AND #{endDtime} AND esmRuleGroupPrntCd IS NOT NULL AND esmRuleGroupCd IS NOT NULL AND cpcgYn = 'y' AND mailSndYn = 'y'
GROUP BY esmRuleGroupPrntCd
GROUP BY srcIp
GROUP BY destPort
ORDER BY CNT DESC
LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT esmRuleGroupCd, esmRuleGroupNm, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ViolAlrtRptTbl WHERE 1 = 1 AND esmRuleGroupPrntCd = '1700' AND esmRuleGroupPrntCd IS NOT NULL AND esmRuleGroupCd IS NOT NULL GROUP BY esmRuleGroupCd ORDER BY CNT DESC
